title: Lowest Industrial Design Applications
description: In 2017, Barbados had only 1 industrial design application filed by residents, one of the lowest counts globally.

title: Lowest Social Contributions
description: In 2016, Barbados recorded social contributions amounting to 239,182 local currency units, which is among the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Stock Market Activity
description: In 2021, the total value of stocks traded in Barbados was 220,000 USD, placing it among the countries with the least stock market activity.
